resources.string: Sallama? Ka tabbata?
Gaba
Babu Match
%d masu amfani
Wasu \'yan aka ta amfani da mazan version. duk \'yan dole ne hažaka ga sabuwar version.
Duk \'yan dole ne hažaka, wasu suna amfani da mazan da tura rajista Formats.
Internet babu, duba ka saituna.
Exchange ƙarewar lokaci wuce. Fara musayar sake.
Uwar garken HTTP Kuskure: %d
Ba daidai ba data samu a musayar. Fara musayar sake.
A shigar da m lamba.
Ka bayar da rahoton wani bambanci a phrases. Fara musayar sake.
A m %d membobin ana buƙatar musanya bayanai.
M data samu a musayar. Fara musayar sake.
Musayar ya bace ake buƙata bayanai.
Dole ne ka zaɓa Ya daya daga cikin kalmomi kafin a ci gaba.
Wani ya ruwaito wani bambanci a phrases. Fara musayar sake.
Ƙwaƙwalwar ya yi yawa low don kammala wannan aiki.
Uwar garken saƙo: %s
Babu amsa daga uwar garken.
Fitar lokaci jiran wasu gungun \'yan don ƙara bayanai.
Mai amfani soke uwar garken request.
Zaži yawan mutanen da suke kokarin musanya bayanai game kuma latsa Ok.

Wannan lambar a kan wannan allon da ake amfani ya halicci musamman rukuni na masu amfani. Duba lambobin a kan duk masu amfani \'fuska, to, duk masu amfani ya kamata shiga guda mafi ƙasƙanci lambar kuma latsa Ok.
Yanzu, dole ne ka dace ɗaya daga cikin waɗannan 3-kalmar kalmomi da duk masu amfani. Kowane mai amfani dole ne ka zaɓa guda na kowa magana, ka kuma danna Next.
Kwatanta fuska a kan %s na\'urorin.
Wadanda ba Turanci
Wannan lambar da ake amfani ya halicci musamman rukuni na masu amfani. Kwatanta, sa\'an nan kuma shigar da mafi ƙasƙanci da dama a tsakanin duk masu amfani.
samu %d abubuwa
Magangara mafi ƙasƙanci
Duk wayoyin dole ne daidaita daya daga cikin 3-kalmar phrases. Kwatanta, sa\'an nan kuma sama da daidai da magana.
SafeSlinger Exchange
jiran tabbaci daga dukan \'yan…
jiran duk masu amfani ya shiga…
gina kungiyar key…
neman membobinsu…
Da yawa masu amfani a cikin musayar?
Grouping
